name: Coloring Book 29
description: This coloring book app is filled with coloring pages of mythical creatures! Color all your favorite characters from myths, legends and folk tales. Each page contains a different mythical creature. Included in this 50 page coloring book is Atlas, Bigfoot, a centaur, a cyclops, a dragon, a dwarf, an elf, a fairy, Father Time, a faun, a genie, a giant, a gnome, a golden fleece, a golem, a gorgon, a gremlin, a griffin, a hydra, a kelpie, a kraken, a leprechaun, Loch Ness, a manticore, a mermaid, a merman, a minotaur, Mother Earth, a muse, Nandi Bear, an ogre, an orc, Orthrus, Pegasus, a phoenix, a pixie, a sea serpent, a siren, a skunk ape, Sphinx, a thunderbird, a troll, Typhon, a unicorn, a valkyrie, a vampire, a werewolf, a witch, a wizard, and a yeti!
